com.google.bitcoin.core

Interface TransactionBroadcaster

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MockTransactionBroadcaster, PeerGroup

    public interface TransactionBroadcaster
    A general interface which declares the ability to broadcast transactions. This is implemented by PeerGroup.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<Transaction> broadcastTransaction(Transaction tx)
      Broadcast the given transaction on the network
